title: Night of the Vampire
description: Vampires are on the loose in Spooksville....Adam and his friends are in real trouble now. A bunch of vampires are stalking Spooksville, turning the normally scary town into a place of pure horror. As fast as one vampire can be stopped, another appears. The gang finally realizes that to stop the bloodsuckers once and for all they have to find the Queen of the Vampires.But this Queen is very old and very smart.Unknown to the gang, she has set a trap for them.A trap that will turn them all into vampires.Cover art by John Youssi
author: Christopher Pike
